name: RELATIVE SPEED: A TAROT WALKING SIM
name_original: RELATIVE SPEED: A TAROT WALKING SIM
description:
Relative Speed is a real-life walking sim combined with a tarot card reading. Play it to add a little bit of magic to a regular stroll around the neighborhood.

You'll first go on a walk and derive outcomes according to instructions. You'll then use those outcomes to put together a seven-card tarot spread.  

Throw rocks. Look at animals. Meander.

Extra Details

  • Original tarot card art
  • This game can be used multiple times. Take it with you on any walk.
